columns.name: email
columns.description: The email address of the person associated with this Account.

columns.name: address_1
columns.description: First line of this Account’s billing address.

columns.name: address_2
columns.description: Second line of this Account’s billing address.

columns.name: balance
columns.description: This Account’s balance, in US dollars.

columns.name: balance_uninvoiced
columns.description: This Account’s current estimated invoice in US dollars. This is not your final invoice balance. Transfer charges are not included in the estimate.

columns.name: city
columns.description: The city for this Account’s billing address.

columns.name: company
columns.description: The company name associated with this Account.

columns.name: country
columns.description: The two-letter country code of this Account’s billing address.

columns.name: credit_card
columns.description: Credit Card information associated with this Account.

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: The first name of the person associated with this Account.

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: The last name of the person associated with this Account.

columns.name: euuid
columns.description: An external unique identifier for this account.

columns.name: phone
columns.description: The phone number associated with this Account.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state for this Account’s billing address.

columns.name: tax_id
columns.description: The tax identification number associated with this Account, for tax calculations in some countries. If you do not live in a country that collects tax, this should be null.

columns.name: zip
columns.description: The zip code of this Account’s billing address.
